content: Limits creativity, lacks technical support, and is definitely not worth paying for. There's a disappointingly long running bug that freezes your phone and doesnt save your videos, and no fix in sight. If you press export more than once, its done for. Theres a saddening lack of effects, as well as types of effects, and most of them just ruin the video anyway. I know its only $3, but its a legitimate dissapointment to have paid for.

Love the effect of it BUT saving it to your gallery and playing it from there, it gives you a stand still picture with audio and when you fast forward to the end of the video, it plays the whole video but no audio.. cropping the length of the video also distorts the video.. pls fix.. :/

Hey tech team can we move the export button from the bottom right? Its so close to the back button on Android that I have accidentally hit it instead losing my footage. Otherwise love the product and you all. Happy 2021!

This app is no longer usable with the android 11 update. When the video is exported to the camera gallery it plays the entire audio for the video with a still video frame. Then after all the recorded audio plays, the video plays with no audio. I tried uninstalling, restarting my phone, and reinstalling the app and the problem persists.

Love this app but I can't watch, export, upload or download videos. I want to tell everyone to buy this up but until you fix this bug i can't. Please whatever it is fix it asap because I want to keep this app for eternity! Update 12/8/2020 I emailed the app dev and he responded pretty quickly and resolved the issue. The app is working as it should now. Download this app for some awesome visuals!
Awesome not that many features however the features it does have is amazing. It gives more vibrancy to videos. Longer videos uploaded from galleries do take a bit of time to load however
Best app ever! I could play in this fractal universe for ever!üôèüåÄ‚ú®
I have the moodhoops pixel wand and this app makes so many different settings and trails, having so much fun learning to use it!!!
I cannot get the video to play back. I get a message saying there was a problem with the video file.

Lots of potential for this app, but the interface is a bit confusing, as I can't figure out how to reset the trail origin back to their default position. Every time I accidentally pinch or swipe the screen, the trails change their direction and I can't set them back to their original position. The little square in the corner doesn't function either as it only shows a graphical depiction of the trail origin point.
Efficient to use this application features amd everything is so good

I bought the app everything was fine but my phone started to glitch out really bad until i deleted the app sad because i enjoyed the app to. But i have an lg stylo 6 not sure if that has anything to do with it but sad day
Really cool but I am so frustrated and tired of exporting a video, getting the notification that it saved to my phone, and the file being nowhere and the video gone forever. Please fix this bug.
replyContent: Thanks for reporting this issue. The videos should be saved to an album called luminancer in your Photos. We will look into this further and provide an improvement.

content: Really was digging the results of this app when I seen other people using it. Unfortunately it does not seem to be correctly uploading a pre recorded video into it, I hope someone can fix this. Then it will be 5 stars.
Only records on Samsung. Has issues processing imported video and won't let you save. Such a shame as i waited for this app for years.
Pretty cool, love using it to edit my videos with my led hoop to show trails
Did not work! Refunded immediately. Videos didn't load/wouldn't save. Not as expected.
Found out tonight cant load in 60fps video. Cuts it down to 30 and i loose frames and creates gaps in the trails. Need to fix this
Flow artist dream app! Especially if you spin fire or LED props. The effects u can use while making videos are very cool!
I love this app... The only question I have ‚Ä¶ is there a download for PC version of this ?
Never have i found such a niche app for such a niche community. No free version so an immediate paywall is also weird to be accepted by so many. Good app. Good effects.
great!! but is there other option to take photo in this application?? hoping for your prompt response.
Great effects, would love an update. Has issues saving some of my videos.

The app is cool, I'm still trying to figure out how it works and such. But anytime I go to export a video the app causes my phone to become completely unresponsive. It wont pull up where to export to, or whatever it's supposed to do. The video just continues to play in the background while all my phones functions cease to work. It takes minutes before I can exit out of the app or even lock my phone. That's a pretty serious problem to have for an app I had to pay for. I'll up the rating after fix
So this app used to work great but now everytime i try and edit a video is says could not process video and will not let me save it
Amazing for poi spinning!!
I've been having issues the past few days my app constantly gives me issues and it usually takes hours to finish videos because usually they cant process.
Such an awesome app. It is my favorite. <3
I couldn't get it working on my phone, but will try downloading again once I have a more updated device.
works wonders for fire dancing
loveee this app! i don't know what i'm doing and yet I still get great results with it. the best for LED and fire flow videos
Was awful on android for me. Kept crashing and couldnt process any video i uploaded.

the app is okay, and does as described so I'm giving it a 5 star, however once I set that the tails flow off in a direction without closing and reopening the app I'm unsure how to undo it. for poi it seems to work well
Please make recording with flash possible. That would be so great for recording with reflective props!
i havent tried it yet but it wpuld be awesome to have a flash feature. edit THANK YOU
replyContent: Thanks for the feedback. Support for flash is coming!

content: phenominal
amazing app. saving a lot of time and energy used in premiere trying to create this same effect with layers of keys and time echo.
thank you so much for making available on android!!! can get back to creating awesome visuals again wohoooo!!!
the trails aspect is great. but when i try with a video thats already been taken, it rotates 180 degrees :(

Hello Tristan,

This will be fixed in an update very soon. Thanks for the feedback!

content: every flow artists must have!
in LOVE!!! Have been waiting for it to come on android and now I am loving life!!
Finally for Android! woohoo!! Seems to work great! Will be using app daily now! So happy‚ù§
yay this is the best app ever. thank you so much for releasing it.
replyContent:
Hi Laurel,

Thanks for letting me know about a problem with saving your videos. The usual way to save a video is to select the export button once the video has stopped recording. This will copy the video to a Luminancer album in the photo gallery. 

I will look into why this isn't working for you.
Thanks for the feedback!

content: The app works just like the iOS version and is pretty great. the downside is that it saves the videos to /Internal storage/Movies/luminacer/ instead of /Internal storage/DCIM/luminancer/ so it does not show up in the gallery. For the videos to show up in your gallery, all you have to do is move it from the Movies folder to DCIM and they will appear. EDIT TO ADD: Thank you for making this change in less than 10 minutes! it works perfectly!
love it so far! Been waiting so long for it, can't wait to make more videos

App is great and seems easier then the iPhone version which is nice! However the videos are not being saved to the correct place which makes them unsharable. Instead of being saved to your gallery or photos like expected it's saving to MyFiles-> Internal storage -> Movies -> Luminancer. When you go to the video you can watch it on your phone but you can't share it to facebook or Instagram which is why I want this app. EDIT: Figured out how to share it but the videos still do not show up in my gallery which I would expect to see them there.
replyContent:
Hello Zurka

Thanks for your excellent feedback. My intention is to have the videos save to a Luminancer album in the photo gallery. I'm looking into why you might be having this problem and I found that the videos take some time to appear in the gallery.  I've submitted a fix in 1.0.11 that improves this and possibly fixes this for you.

Thanks!
